name: @ersul4ik/swcregfirst
description: Python library for accessing SWC-registry content.

scripts.clean: rm -rf node_modules/ && rm -rf package-lock.json && rm -r dist
scripts.build:prod: npm run clean && npm install && tsc index.ts && mkdir dist && mv index.js dist/ && cp package.json swc-definition.json dist/

author: ersul4ik
